title: Help
content:
I need to identify these fonts. Can you help me?  
They come from The science of dreams movie.

Thank you

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090703054843im_/http:/typophile.com/files/k_5595.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090703054843im_/http:/typophile.com/files/d_4018.png)
author: catarina dantas

comments.content:
Hi Catarina,  
welcome to Typophile!

I’d say #2 started out as Verdana/Tahoma.  
F

——  
 [Please use a descriptive title next time! Thank you.](http://web.archive.org/web/20090703054843/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq/#Q_2 "Frequently Asked Question – What do I enter in the “Title” line?")

Sorry for the delay and thankyou for your help.  
I’ll enlarge the title next time!
